name: oaks-letter
effect: Grants access to Flower Paradise and Shaymin.
short_effect: Allows access to Seabreak path, Flower Paradise, and Shaymin.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
